name: swathe
content:
swathe noun
(AREA)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] a long strip or large area especially of land: Huge swathes of rainforest are being cleared for farming and mining.
[ S ] literary a large part of something that includes several different things: These people represent a broad/wide swathe of public opinion.
